Projects.name: Adamo Foods
Projects.problem: Animal farming is a leading contributor to climate change and environmental degradation. Steak production is resource-intensive.
Projects.solution: Leveraging fungi to create fibrous fungus roots (mycelium) as a sustainable and efficient alternative to beef steak.

Projects.name: 1MT Nation
Projects.problem: Combat climate change and offset carbon emissions.
Projects.solution: Restoring 1 million hectares of degraded lands by planting polyculture native bamboo, sequestering carbon dioxide pollution, and supporting local communities.

Projects.name: Telo Trucks
Projects.problem: Need for practical and sustainable trucks suited for urban and suburban environments and active lifestyles.
Projects.solution: Building right-sized trucks with space for people and gear, promoting purposeful and responsible mobility.

Projects.name: Enersee
Projects.problem: Energy efficiency is a modern issue.
Projects.solution: AI-driven platform for energy managers to optimize energy utilization, detect issues, and make informed decisions.

Projects.name: Uncaged Innovations
Projects.problem: Alternatives to materials harming the ecosystem, such as traditional leather.
Projects.solution: Developing biomaterials that mimic leather without the negative environmental impact, reducing water, chemicals, and methane emissions.

Projects.name: EVRNU
Projects.problem: Textile waste and unsustainable production methods.
Projects.solution: Using black soldier flies to transform organic waste into valuable biomaterials for various applications, promoting a circular economy.

Projects.name: Climatebase
Projects.problem: Challenges in hiring mission-driven talent for climate companies.
Projects.solution: Connecting companies with top talent through a platform for climate careers, supporting the growth of the climate sector.

Projects.name: insectta
Projects.problem: Food waste in landfills and unsustainable biomaterial production.
Projects.solution: Using black soldier flies to valorize organic waste and produce valuable biomaterials like chitosan and melanin.

Projects.name: Solar Ladder
Projects.problem: Disorganized solar installer needs.
Projects.solution: Full-stack supply chain platform for solar installers, streamlining the solar energy installation process.

Projects.name: Universe Energy Inc.
Projects.problem: Batteries are challenging to reuse due to expensive shipping, non-standard testing, and dangerous manual disassembly.
Projects.solution: Automate the battery reuse process using machine learning and robotics, turning them into grid storage or raw materials for new cells.

Projects.name: Urbyn
Projects.problem: Sustainable management of business waste throughout France.
Projects.solution: Analyze waste production, find recovery solutions with a network of service providers, offer sorting systems, and assist in waste collection and management.

Projects.name: RAIKU
Projects.problem: Single-use plastic packaging.
Projects.solution: Introduce RAIKU wrap, a 100% natural and compostable alternative to plastic bubble wrap and packaging filling.

Projects.name: sensand
Projects.problem: Collect and collate data for carbon credit creation and crop optimization.
Projects.solution: Provide an all-in-one digital agriculture ecosystem, integrating smart farming and land management technologies with a carbon credit trading platform.

Projects.name: Allye
Projects.problem: Providing cheaper, cleaner energy for businesses and homes.
Projects.solution: Offer distributed energy storage with smart battery technology to lower energy costs and accelerate grid decarbonization.

Projects.name: dClimate
Projects.problem: Seamless data exchange and collaboration in climate technology.
Projects.solution: Create a transparent, decentralized marketplace for standardized, monetized, and distributed climate data, forecasts, and models.

Projects.name: Forum for African Women Educationalists
Projects.problem: Ensuring quality education and equal opportunities for Kenyan girls.
Projects.solution: Work with Ministries of Education to implement programs promoting education for girls and women, leveraging existing institutions and structures.

Projects.name: BIOCeanOR
Projects.problem: Anticipating water quality deterioration and climate change impact on oceans and aquaculture.
Projects.solution: Predictive monitoring of water quality, better understanding of the environment, and support for sustainable aquaculture through digitalization.

Projects.name: NetZeroNitrogen
Projects.problem: Addressing climate change, sustainable agriculture, and rural development.
Projects.solution: Bringing biochar at scale in the tropics to perform long-term carbon removal from the atmosphere, improve soil quality, and promote sustainable practices.

Projects.name: Re-Fresh Global
Projects.problem: Disrupting the textile industry and tackling textile waste.
Projects.solution: Transforming textile waste into new raw materials, offering innovative solutions to revolutionize the linear textile industry.

Projects.name: Aviwell
Projects.problem: Improving animal health for global food security.
Projects.solution: Developing natural and sustainable feed solutions to enhance animal growth and health, with proprietary algorithms and biomimicry.

Projects.name: Zero Homes
Projects.problem: Reducing carbon emissions from buildings and enabling home electrification.
Projects.solution: A home electrification marketplace providing guidance, assistance, and projects for homeowners to reduce their home's carbon footprint.

Projects.name: Alga Biosciences
Projects.problem: Ruminants, mainly cattle, account for 27% of annual methane emissions in the USA.
Projects.solution: Using biochemistry to eliminate enteric methane emissions, Alga's feed supplement reduces methane emissions in cattle and provides financial benefits to cattle owners.

Projects.name: Aquaria
Projects.problem: Safeguarding access to water against drought and climate change.
Projects.solution: Aquaria's atmospheric water generators (AWGs) tap into air humidity to provide a renewable source of water, acting as a backup or alternative water supply for consumers facing water stress or contamination.

Projects.name: Ludlow Electrochemical Hardware
Projects.problem: Extracting hydrogen from excess emitted gas mixtures.
Projects.solution: Ludlow offers multiple electrochemical hydrogen pump (EHP) platforms capable of producing high-purity hydrogen from gas mixtures.

Projects.name: Big Akwa
Projects.problem: Creating synergy between co-located fish farming and the forest industry.
Projects.solution: Big Akwa introduces industrial symbiosis between aquaculture and the industry, resulting in more efficient fish farming and valuable by-products like fertilizer and animal feed.

Projects.name: Brilliant Planet
Projects.problem: Permanently removing carbon at a gigaton scale.
Projects.solution: Brilliant Planet utilizes algae in open-air pond-based systems to sequester carbon at a large scale, contributing to ocean and air health.

Projects.name: Groguru
Projects.problem: Optimal irrigation is required to maximize crop yield and save water and resources.
Projects.solution: GroGuru's irrigation management solution, using Wireless Underground System (WUGS) technology, enables farmers to optimize irrigation and improve sustainability.

Projects.name: OpConnect
Projects.problem: Making electric vehicle charging accessible and efficient.
Projects.solution: OpConnect provides cloud-based software platforms for fleet, property, and facility managers to streamline electric vehicle charging operations.

Projects.name: Divirod
Projects.problem: Understanding and predicting water risks due to climate change.
Projects.solution: Divirod is building a comprehensive data lake to map, manage, and predict water risks, aiding in informed decisions for water resource conservation and protection.

Projects.name: SnoFox Sciences
Projects.problem: Improving efficiency and reducing energy usage in cold warehousing and 3PL.
Projects.solution: SnoFox Sciences provides thermodynamically-informed data analytics for cold chain monitoring and preventative maintenance, revolutionizing cold industrial space efficiency.

Projects.name: GlassPoint
Projects.problem: Reducing carbon emissions and cost in steam production.
Projects.solution: GlassPoint's solar steam production harnesses sunshine to reduce emissions and cost in industrial steam production.

Projects.name: Adamo Foods
Projects.problem: Animal farming is a leading contributor to climate change and environmental degradation. Steak production is resource-intensive.
Projects.solution: Leveraging fungi to create fibrous fungus roots (mycelium) as a sustainable and efficient alternative to beef steak.

Projects.solution: Restoring 1 million hectares of degraded lands by planting polyculture native bamboo, sequestering carbon dioxide pollution, and supporting local communities.

Projects.solution: Building right-sized trucks with space for people and gear, promoting purposeful and responsible mobility.
